column5: We're planning a trip to the area in the coming week and I was wondering if anyone was aware of the current water conditions in the area.  Is the river water level higher or lower than normal right now ?  We're trying to get an idea of water issues if any we're going to have getting into the back country  If anyone has any info it would be appreciated.  thanks.

i thought high falls was wawa/michipicten area???  if you're more specific as to where exactly your headed i may be able to help.  you could also contact great lakes power to see as to how many cfs they are running at as compared to past years...
It's my father-in-law that's headed there and he tells me its the Matachewan area ?  Does that help ?
we were speaking of different montreal rivers/high falls!  sorry for the mixup!
I was figuring the same as you Dr.
